Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the sales. Do you want to continue ?

MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot cancel this Transaction.')

MlsTrans('Cannot edit document within approval process')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(DocEntry),SUM(DocTotal) FROM OPQT (NOLOCK) WHERE (DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2') AND (CardName LIKE '%'+':3'+'%') AND Canceled <> 'C' AND (Canceled = ':4' OR ':4' IS NULL OR ':4' = '') AND (DocStatus = ':5' OR ':5' IS NULL OR ':5' = '') AND (U_IDU_PT = ':6' OR ':6' IS NULL OR ':6' = '') AND (DocType = ':7' OR ':7' IS NULL OR ':7' = '') AND (DocNum LIKE '%'+':8'+'%') :9

SELECT DocEntry, DocNum, DocType, CANCELED, Handwrtten, Printed, DocStatus, InvntSttus, Transfered, ObjType, DocDate, DocDueDate, CardCode, CardName, Address, NumAtCard, VatPercent, VatSum, VatSumFC, DiscPrcnt, DiscSum, DiscSumFC, DocCur, DocRate, DocTotal, DocTotalFC, PaidToDate, U_IDU_PT, UserSign, CreateDate, CreateTS, UserSign2, UpdateDate, UpdateTS, WddStatus FROM OPQT (NOLOCK) WHERE (DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2') AND (CardName LIKE '%'+':3'+'%') AND Canceled <> 'C' AND (Canceled = ':4' OR ':4' IS NULL OR ':4' = '') AND (DocStatus = ':5' OR ':5' IS NULL OR ':5' = '') AND (U_IDU_PT = ':6' OR ':6' IS NULL OR ':6' = '') AND (DocType = ':7' OR ':7' IS NULL OR ':7' = '') AND (DocNum LIKE '%'+':8'+'%') :9 ORDER BY DocEntry DESC
